document.full_text: daimler ag was ordered on wednesday to face a u.s. lawsuit alleging it participated in the kidnapping, torture and death of mercedes-benz workers in argentina's "dirty war" three decades ago.
document.title: daimler must face argentina abuse lawsuit in u.s.
lines_and_colors: daimler ag was ordered on wednesday to face a u.s. lawsuit alleging it participated in the kidnapping, torture and death of mercedes-benz workers in argentina's "dirty war" three decades ago.
